trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Saint Paul
There were no other sightings in Saint Paul on or around May 29th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsThe fireworks extravaganza had just ended. As the smoke cleared, I heard the shrill voice of a child "What is that?" A circular object was in the southern sky and it looked like a golden yellow planet with black wisps on it. The diameter was that of a 747. It was seen at a 35 degree angle and it appeared to be 3.5 miles away. The object seemed to be moving away at warp speed. It seem to disappear in quarters. 'It was like something out of Star Trek." There was a huge crowd of people leaving Midway Stadium at the time. There were media crews present. The witness expected to see mention of it on T.V., but there was no coverage at all. The weather had been perfect with no clouds in the sky and no humidity.
Summary: "It's the Midway Mothership. The diameter was as large as a 747."
